trans-unit.source: Contains text and speech attribute information for consumption by a speech synthsizer engine.
trans-unit.target: 包含由语音 synthsizer 引擎使用的文本和语音属性信息。

trans-unit.source: The Speech platform infrastructure unpacks the XML based structure of the SSML input and constructs TextFragment objects.
trans-unit.target: 语音平台基础结构对输入的 SSML 的基于 XML 结构进行解压缩和构造 TextFragment 对象。

trans-unit.source: Speech content is available through the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextLength%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextOffset%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextToSpeak%2A> properties of a TextFragment instance.
trans-unit.target: 语音内容是可通过<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextLength%2A>， <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextOffset%2A>，和<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextToSpeak%2A>TextFragment 实例的属性。</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextToSpeak%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextOffset%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextLength%2A>

trans-unit.source: Speech attribute information, such as emphasis, pitch, and rate, are obtained from the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> object returned by the TextFragment<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 语音特性信息，如强调、 音调、 和速率，获取从<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>返回 TextFragment 对象<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A>属性。</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>

trans-unit.source: Constructs a new instance of <xref uid="langword_csharp_TextFragment" name="TextFragment" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 构造的新实例<xref uid="langword_csharp_TextFragment" name="TextFragment" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Default constructor for <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>的默认构造函数

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets speech attribute information for a <xref uid="langword_csharp_TextFragment" name="TextFragment" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的语音的属性信息<xref uid="langword_csharp_TextFragment" name="TextFragment" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default value of this property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的默认值是`null`。

trans-unit.source: Prosody information can be obtained from the instance of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.Prosody> returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Prosody%2A> property on the instance of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> returned by State.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过从实例获取 prosody 信息<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.Prosody>返回<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Prosody%2A>的实例上的属性<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>返回的状态。</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Prosody%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.Prosody>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState"></xref> instance is returned, or used to set speech attribute information for a <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState"> </xref>返回，或用于设置的语音的属性信息实例<xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the length of the speech text in the fragment.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在片段中的语音文本的长度。

trans-unit.source: The default value of this property is 0.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的默认值为 0。

trans-unit.source: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_int" name="int" href=""></xref> is returned or can be used to set the length, in character, of the text string associated with this fragment to be spoken.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_int" name="int" href=""> </xref>返回任何内容，或者可以用于设置字符，与此片段要朗读的文本字符串中的长度。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the starting location of the text in the fragment.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在片段中的文本的起始位置。

trans-unit.source: The default value of this property is 0.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的默认值为 0。

trans-unit.source: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_int" name="int" href=""></xref> is returned or can be used to set the start location, in character, of the part of text string associated with this fragment to be spoken.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_int" name="int" href=""> </xref>返回任何内容，或者可以用于设置字符，与此片段要朗读的文本字符串的一部分中的开始位置。

trans-unit.source: Sets or gets the speech text of the fragment.
trans-unit.target: 设置或获取片段的语音文本。

trans-unit.source: The default value of this property is `System.String.Empty`.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的默认值是`System.String.Empty`。

trans-unit.source: Applications are free to completely change the value of TextToSpeak.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序可随意完全更改 TextToSpeak 的值。

trans-unit.source: Resetting the value of TextToSpeak will not change the value of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextOffset%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextLength%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 重置 TextToSpeak 的值不会更改的值<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextOffset%2A>以及<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextLength%2A>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextLength%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextOffset%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_System.String" name="System.String" href=""></xref> is returned or can be used to set the speech text to be used by a speech synthesis engine to generate audio output.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_System.String" name="System.String" href=""> </xref>返回任何内容，或者可以用来设置要使用语音合成引擎以生成音频输出语音文本。
